abstract: Success of law professor Elyn R Saks's book The Center Cannot Hold, memoir about her struggle with schizophrenia, has encouraged others with the disease to volunteer for studies on how they cope.
snippet: The success of a book by Elyn R. Saks, a law professor, has encouraged others with schizophrenia to volunteer for studies on how they cope.
lead_paragraph: The success of a book by Elyn R. Saks, a law professor, has encouraged others with schizophrenia to volunteer for studies on how they cope.

headline.main: Memoir About Schizophrenia Spurs Others to Come Forward
headline.print_headline: Memoir About Schizophrenia Spurs Others to Come Forward
headline.seo: Elyn R. Saks’s Memoir on Schizophrenia Inspires Others
